shrimp.name: Diffuse
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: dtoggle
input.description: Toggle 1 or 3 argument diffuse, see usage

shrimp.usage: Lambertian Diffuse term. The diffuse color value is passed to the "aov_surfacecolor", and the diffuse value to the "aov_diffuse" AOV presets. Pixie's diffuse shadeop has 2 forms, the first one with a single argument, with the surface normal "N", the second form, with 3 arguments, allowing the surface position and angle (in radians) to be specified as well. The default cone angle is PI/2. The variable "dtoggle" toggles between the single argument "diffuse" (0), and the 3 arguments "diffuse" (1).
